abstract: inclusion criteria: (a) longitudinal studies with at least three measurement waves measuring PTSD [post-traumatic stress disorder], (b) studies that measured PTSD on a continuous scale via an interview or questionnaire, (c) and studies that used a clustering method (LGMM [latent growth mixture modeling], LCGA [latent class growth analyses], hierarchical cluster analysis), (d) traumatic stress symptoms following events that appeared to fulfill DSM-IV [Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders] criterion A1 for PTSD or acute stress disorder.
